skill.name: The Fang of Gluttony
skill.description: Decrease incoming DMG by {{x}}% for {{y}} turn(s). Consumes based off of enemy's current HP by {{z}}%. Heal 100% of consumed HP.

profile.description: Blood... Fresh Blood... If it were you... Would you able to quench this thirst...?
profile.hobby: Mediation... In he hopes that the impulse will subside
profile.like: Breezes that cool bottom the heat
rumors: The moment our eye met, my entire body froze. The sight of that pretty face, flushed, gasping to breath... I don' think I'll ever forget it.
She always seems to be feeling hot, It's probably because the bloodlust takes over her body and constantly releases heat...

lines.line: I wonder what your blood tastes like...
Urgh... I need to satiate this thirst...
Cooking is merely a way to help me regain my strength...
